promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a gigantic special ibex psychic-type pokemon with amethyst hooves. It can be found in cave-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, psychic or ibex. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Amethicon, a a gigantic special ibex psychic-type pokemon. It can be found in cave-like environments It has the following abilities: Ruthless Tail. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "ibex", "psychic" or "Amethicon". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of psychic-type pokemon, ibex-like, special, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, dreamy background
generatedDescription: Existing in shadowy caverns, this colossal creature uses its mental prowess and mighty tail to conquer adversaries with unwavering zeal.
